name: MyTP Freeskiing 2
description:
MyTP Freeskiing continues – featuring amazing new slopes with a bunch of kicker lines, boxes and rails… smooth & technical halfpipe riding… big air events… individual characters... an ONLINE MULTIPLAYER…picture export…replay option and much more ! Welcome the one and only freeskiing game for your iPhone®, iPod touch® & iPad™!

Start your mobile freeskiing experience right now and try MyTP Freeskiing 2 for FREE – learn new tricks in the mountains of Flachauwinkl, Austria, visit Mountain High in Southern California, USA or show your skills in LAAX surrounded by the Swiss Alps. Visit the largest freestyle sports event in Europe – freestyle.ch - in Zurich and show us your technical double rodeos and your personalized style trick to become the freestyle.champ ! 
Ride wherever and whatever you want – from freeriding in the dreamland of Alaska, the road gap at the randerline session to the halfpipe BestTrick Session – MyTP Freeskiing gives you all the possibilites.

You can play with your own “styled” character - Would you like to ride as a girl or guy, with a blue or yellow jacket ? No problem ! It`s your decision.


FULL PACKAGE FEATURES 

+++ Full content of all resorts – bigger and longer slopes which will please you with more kickers, boxes, rails and halfpipes. Try to beat the highscores ! 

+++ Full competition spectrum – Get the chance to move on at the events and sessions. Is your riding good enough for the final round ? Impress us, impress your friends !

+++ Full stuff choice - choose a character, select a jacket and take the skis that meet your taste. Your riding - your style ! 

VISIT US to see whats coming up next and get tips & more… – mytpfreeskiing.com 

FOLLOW US – twitter.com/randerline 
LIKE US – facebook.com/randerline 
WATCH US – youtube.com/randerline 


*** COMPATIBLE DEVICES *** 
MyTP Freeskiing 2 is compatible with 3rd (32GB & 64GB) and 4th generation iPod touch, iPhone 3GS, iPhone 4 and iPad. 

***IMPORTANT NOTICE*** 
If you experience any problems with the game or in case you have any questions or comments, please contact us directly - support(at)mytpfreeskiing.com. You may also contact us by visiting one of our websites -MyTPfreeskiing.com or randerline.com. We will read and account for all reviews here, but we can only answer and help you via email. Thank you.


*************************************************************
Don't miss out on our BRAND NEW game DMBX - Mountain Biking !!!
